entry.title: Poolside Secrets
entry.summary:
Author: Nightowl_22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,328Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 3

Summary: Eli Hale has always wondered why, every couple of weeks, his father Derek sends him and his mother Jennifer off on an all-expenses-paid shopping spree with the unlimited black Mastercard—insisting they leave the estate for the entire afternoon while the mysterious “pool boy” comes to do maintenance. This time, Eli fakes a stomach ache and stays behind, hiding in the bushes by the pool to finally uncover the truth. What he finds shocks him to his core: his macho, straight-presenting father—naked, plugged, and shamelessly sunbathing with his massive, fat, hairy ass on full display—getting thoroughly worshipped, eaten, and wrecked by the pool boy’s eleven-inch monster cock. From the jeweled plug being slowly pulled out to Derek begging to be bred like a desperate slut, Eli watches (and secretly records) every filthy, explicit moment, his world tilting on its axis as he realizes this definitely isn’t the first time. Or the one where Eli discovers that the real reason Derek sends the family away is so he can get his closeted, greedy, hairy hole absolutely destroyed by the hung pool boy, and Eli can’t look away.

entry.title: Fingers Crossed
entry.summary:
Author: UnknownXFuture

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 396,956Chapters: 35/40Kudos: 1,014

Summary: “Have you ever heard of the butterfly effect?” Stiles looked up and shook his head. “No… what is it?” “It’s the idea that the smallest of situations, can set the biggest consequences in motion. A butterfly flapping it’s wings on one side of the world, creates a hurricane on the other.” He nodded, that’s exactly how this situation sounds right now. If he and Scott never went out that fateful night and looked for that body, or if he and Derek never became friends, or hell, if he never agreed to Deatons plan in the first place… then none of this would be happening. But fuck it, ‘caution’ isn’t in his vocabulary. ~~~ Updates every Monday <3

Summary: Derek Hale didn’t expect getting lost in his own neighborhood to change anything—until the night he frightened a stranger in a dark alley without meaning to. Stiles Stilinski is deaf, skittish, stubborn, all sharp eyes and quiet panic, a notebook clutched to his chest, and a silence Derek doesn’t understand until much later. Soon Stiles is stepping into Derek’s messy loft, borrowing his books, drinking his tea, and filling Derek’s quiet spaces with the warm, steady presence Derek didn’t know he needed. Things begin to get tricky when Derek realizes that his erotic stories more and more star Stiles instead of the usual sexy female heroine. But everything's under control until one day, Stiles is curled on Derek’s couch reading the manuscript he never intended anyone to see. Derek isn’t sure what terrifies him more: getting lost in the dark with no one to help him or Stiles recognizing the pieces of himself hidden in the pages.
